title: Top-Rated Five-Star Maldives Paradise with Malé Transfers & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Leave it all behind for the postcard-perfect beauty of the Maldives, staying in five-star luxury at LUX* South Ari Atoll - a drop in the ocean just a 25-minute seaplane ride from Malé. Hailed by Condé Nast Traveller as one of the best hotels in the Maldives, and winner of a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice Award 2020, this dreamy resort is the setting for a once-in-a-lifetime Maldives escape.

Do as much or as little as you like at this island paradise. Relax beside two glittering infinity pools, taste your way around eight eateries and five bars - offering everything from sushi to island-roasted coffee - enjoy music and drinks at the Beach Rouge beach club, partake in yoga beneath the palms, catch a movie under the stars at Cinema Paradiso or try your hand at watersports. Use the onsite 5-star PADI dive centre to discover the colourful underwater world, with 50 dive sites nearby waiting to be explored, brimming with wildlife from sea turtles to dolphins and whale sharks.
